description.value: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal], heightened to 9th rank, as an innate primal spell that you can cast once per day, but can only summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.Cave Worm]{Purple Worm}. At 20th level, you can summon an elite purple worm instead.

publication.title: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm
